mapper.select: SELECT professornum, professorname, professorphone, hiredate, majornum FROM professor WHERE professornum = #{professornum}
mapper.insert:
select max(professornum))+1 from professor
insert into professor(professornum, professorname, professorphone, hiredate, majornum) values (#{professornum}, #{professorname}, #{professorphone}, #{hiredate}, #{majornum} trunc(sysdate), 0 )
